## Introduction

This presentations summarizes the main findings of two data sets:
- Number of telephones in various regions of the world
- Average heights and weights for American women aged 30???39.

 
## Number of telephones in various regions of the world 

The data "Telephones in various regions of the world" contents the following information: 

- Phone users (in thousands)
- Regions
  - North America
  - Europe
  - Asia
  - South America
  - Oceania
  - Africa
  - Central America
- Yeears
  - 1951, 1956, 1957, 1958, 1959, 1960, 1961
